mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply(rno ,reply, replyer, bno) VALUES(reply_rno_seq.nextval, #{reply},#{replyer},#{bno})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply=#{reply}, replyer=#{replyer}, bno=#{bno}, updateDate=sysdate WHERE rno=#{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno=#{bno}
